programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia. (cc)(n).(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia. (live) (cc)(n).(n)

The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia. (live) (cc)(n).(n)

programme.title: The Affair: 303
programme.desc: Running from secrets she left behind in Paris, Juliette finds Noah an alluring prospect. But a terrifying event shatters all hope of an easy affair. Meanwhile, Noah must fight like never before to make sense of what just occurred(n).(n)

programme.title: Tony Roberts: Motorcity Motormouth
programme.desc: Detroit native Tony T. Roberts returns to his hometown for a raucous and occasionally musical night of stand up where no topic is off limits and anything can happen(n).(n)

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Frank Miller's classic graphic novels return to the screen, weaving together gritty tales that feature Basin City's most hardboiled citizens as they cross paths with the town's more notorious inhabitants. Stars Jessica Alba, Josh Brolin and Mickey Rourke(n).(n)

programme.title: Blue Velvet
programme.desc: Kyle MacLachlan stars as a college student who returns home after his father has a stroke and discovers a severed ear in an abandoned field. When he attempts to find out what has happened, he is drawn into a dark, depraved and mysterious world. David Lynch directs. Co-stars Isabella Rossellini, Dennis Hopper and Laura Dern(n).(n)

programme.title: Public Enemy: Live from Metropolis Studios
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a special performance by one of the most influential hip hop acts of all time at the world famous Metropolis Sound Studio in London. Twenty-five years after the release of Public Enemy's most successful album Fear of a Black Planet, the rap legends Chuck D, Flavor Flav, DJ Lord and The S1W perform all of their fan favorites, interspersed with frank interview footage(n).(n)

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: Electrocuted in a hairdryer mishap, womanizing ad exec Nick Marshall (Mel Gibson) is suddenly able to hear the thoughts of the opposite sex. At first, Nick thinks he's been given a terrific advantage in the bedroom and the boardroom, but soon his psychic gift turns the once-clueless Nick into a better father, employee and man, a transformation that does not go unnoticed by his beautiful boss Darcy (Helen Hunt). Alan Alda, Marisa Tomei, Lauren Holly, Ashley Johnson and Mark Feuerstein costar in this comedy blockbuster(n).(n)

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life(n).(n)

programme.title: Daydream Nation
programme.desc: Bored by her new town and classmates, the new girl (Kat Dennings) seduces a handsome teacher, flirts with a stoner, and avoids a local serial killer targeting teenagers. Josh Lucas and Reece Thompson costar in this offbeat dark comedy(n).(n)

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley(n).(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award� winner Helen Mirren(n).(n)

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life(n).(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in this thriller as a divorced boat builder who believes his 11-year-old son is lying about witnessing his new step-dad (Vince Vaughn) committing a murder, until a little investigation reveals that the new man in his family's life is not who he claims to be. Teri Polo costars(n).(n)

programme.title: The Salvation
programme.desc: In the 1870s Wild West, a peaceful American settler kills his family's murderer, which unleashes the fury of a notorious gang leader who is hell bent on hunting the settler down, in this blood spattered saga of sin and redemption. Stars Eva Green(n).(n)

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson stars as a cop who asserts his own code of justice, blurring the lines between right and wrong, but when he gets caught on tape beating a suspect, he finds himself caught in a downwards emotional spiral, amidst a corruption scandal. Also stars Sigourney Weaver, Robin Wright and Ice Cube(n).(n)

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: Soccer is the most popular sport in Iran; yet for years it's been nearly impossible for women to play. Lesley Stahl reports on American Katayoun Khosrowyar and others who are trying to get more girls into the game. Plus, Phil Koeghan goes along for a ride with the best all-around waterman the aloha state has produced in a generation: Kai Lenny. And in his first extensive interview since going to prison, former NBA All Star Jayson Williams opens up to Jon Wertheim about the night of the shooting and his lifelong battle with alcoholism(n).(n)

programme.title: 2016 Week 13
programme.desc: Exclusive NFL Films highlights of every game, every week of the football season. Plus, hard-hitting commentary and expert analysis from host James Brown, Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, Michael Irvin and New York Jets Brandon Marshall(n).(n)

programme.title: Ride or Die
programme.desc: Fiona, facing mounting issues, contemplates Margo's offer to buy the laundromat. Meanwhile, Ian tries to deal with the fact that Mickey might be out of prison and Kev and V take matters into their own hands after Svetlana's betrayal(n).(n)

programme.title: 2016 Week 13
programme.desc: Exclusive NFL Films highlights of every game, every week of the football season. Plus, hard-hitting commentary and expert analysis from host James Brown, Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, Michael Irvin and New York Jets Brandon Marshall(n).(n)

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: Soccer is the most popular sport in Iran; yet for years it's been nearly impossible for women to play. Lesley Stahl reports on American Katayoun Khosrowyar and others who are trying to get more girls into the game. Plus, Phil Koeghan goes along for a ride with the best all-around waterman the aloha state has produced in a generation: Kai Lenny. And in his first extensive interview since going to prison, former NBA All Star Jayson Williams opens up to Jon Wertheim about the night of the shooting and his lifelong battle with alcoholism(n).(n)

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: Robert De Niro stars as a vicious psychopath and ex-convict who devotes his life to stalking and destroying the family of the man who put him in jail. Directed by Martin Scorcese. Also stars Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange and Juliette Lewis(n).(n)

programme.title: The Nasty Show hosted by Artie Lange
programme.desc: In this comedy special, the legendary Artie Lange hosts a line up of the most deranged and hilarious minds in comedy that's not for the faint of heart. Features Mike Wilmot, Mike Ward, Gina Yashere, Luenell, Jimmy Carr and Gilbert Gottfried(n).(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas(n).(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in this thriller as a divorced boat builder who believes his 11-year-old son is lying about witnessing his new step-dad (Vince Vaughn) committing a murder, until a little investigation reveals that the new man in his family's life is not who he claims to be. Teri Polo costars(n).(n)

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: An eccentric casino owner (John Cleese) pits six teams against each other in a dash across the desert to a locker stuffed with $2 million in this madcap comedy. Among the racers: a narcoleptic Italian (Rowan Atkinson), an uptight politician (Breckin Meyer), a daredevil pilot (Amy Smart), a just-reunited mother and daughter (Whoopi Goldberg and Lanei Chapman), a greedy family man (Jon Lovitz), dimwitted brothers (Seth Green and Vince Vieluf), and a disgraced NFL ref (Cuba Gooding Jr.)(n).(n)

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring(n).(n)

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes(n).(n)

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse(n).(n)

programme.title: Jay Mohr: Happy. And A Lot.
programme.desc: Stand up comedian Jay Mohr reveals everything from the intimate - marriage, raising a child and more - to the extraordinary in this hilarious comedy special(n).(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis(n).(n)

programme.title: ONE & DONE/BEN SIMMONS
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports chronicles the sprawling journey of number one NBA draft pick Ben Simmons. From a relatively anonymous Australian upbringing to high school and college in America to the top of the rookie class in the world's foremost basketball league, ONE & DONE chronicles a pivotal period in a young man's life, capturing Simmons and his inner circle as they realize a lifelong dream in the limelight of an exclusive fraternity of top NBA draft picks(n).(n)

programme.title: 3:10 To Yuma
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Christian Bale star in this blazing Western remake as, respectively, a daring outlaw and the humble farmer deputized to deliver him to justice. Peter Fonda, Gretchen Mol, Ben Foster and Alan Tudyk costar in this acclaimed frontier adventure(n).(n)

programme.title: The Passion of the Christ
programme.desc: Dramatic rendering of the last 12 hours of Jesus' life which depicts the story of Judas? betrayal and the brutal violence that follows. Mel Gibson directs(n).(n)

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh(n).(n)

programme.title: 2016 Week 13
programme.desc: Exclusive NFL Films highlights of every game, every week of the football season. Plus, hard-hitting commentary and expert analysis from host James Brown, Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, Michael Irvin and New York Jets Brandon Marshall(n).(n)

programme.title: Bless The Child
programme.desc: Psychiatric nurse Maggie O'Connell (Kim Basinger) fights her drug-addicted sister (Christina Ricci) and a Satanic cult leader (Rufus Sewell) for custody of her niece, a six-year-old girl who is the key to winning the battle between good and evil. Jimmy Smits costars in this supernatural thriller from the director of "The Mask."(n).(n)

programme.title: Arctic Tale
programme.desc: The producers of "March of the Penguins" and "An Inconvenient Truth" team up to present this dazzling documentary that chronicles the endangered life cycles of a walrus and a polar bear, whose frozen habitats are rapidly disappearing thanks to global warming(n).(n)

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: Oscar winner� Anne Hathaway stars as a woman whose musician brother is left in a coma following a car accident, leading her to seek out his idols and finding herself falling for an unlikely match in this romantic drama set against the backdrop of Brooklyn's vibrant indie music scene(n).(n)

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible(n).(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in this thriller as a divorced boat builder who believes his 11-year-old son is lying about witnessing his new step-dad (Vince Vaughn) committing a murder, until a little investigation reveals that the new man in his family's life is not who he claims to be. Teri Polo costars(n).(n)

programme.title: Weiner
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a jaw-dropping, behind-the-scenes look at the attempted comeback of Anthony Weiner in 2013 as he mounts a campaign for New York City mayor in the wake of his sexting scandal. But it's not long before history repeats itself and new sexting allegations leave Weiner and his aides scrambling to contain the damage. Featuring unfettered access to the candidate and his campaign. Winner of the 2016 Sundance Grand Jury Prize for U.S. Documentary(n).(n)

programme.title: A Murder in the Park
programme.desc: Documentary glimpse into a very broken criminal justice system as nearly 16 years after his confession exonerated a death row inmate and sparked the end of the death penalty in Illinois, Alstory Simon languishes in prison serving a 37-year sentence over a confession he claims was coerced(n).(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel(n).(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in this thriller as a divorced boat builder who believes his 11-year-old son is lying about witnessing his new step-dad (Vince Vaughn) committing a murder, until a little investigation reveals that the new man in his family's life is not who he claims to be. Teri Polo costars(n).(n)

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims(n).(n)

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: In this Australian horror flick a young nurse begins work at an isolated psychiatric ward, and quickly becomes fascinated with a brain dead patient who is the subject of a mad scientist's cruel and unusual experiments. What starts as an innocent fascination quickly takes a sinister turn, as the patient begins to use his psychic powers to manipulate her every move(n).(n)

programme.title: Survival Island

Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration(n).(n)

programme.title: Johnny Belinda
programme.desc: Jane Wyman won an Oscar for her portrayal of a deaf woman living a hardscrabble life in a Nova Scotia fishing village, where she is taught to communicate by a young doctor. Later, she is raped by a local lout, and charged when he is later found murdered. The film was nominated for 12 Oscars, including Best Picture, Director (Jean Negulesco) and Actor (Lew Ayres), but Wyman's was the only win(n).(n)

programme.title: The Swan

In May 1944, the Marines recuperate on Pavuvu, but a prostrate Leckie is sent to a naval hospital on Banika for psychiatric observation. Meanwhile, Eugene Sledge trains as a mortarman at Camp Elliott in California. (cc)(n).(n)

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: Eugene Sledge has a brief reunion with Sid Phillips on Pavuvu in June 1944 and gets his first taste of combat the following September, when the 1st Marines meet heavy resistance landing on Peleliu. Meanwhile, John Basilone experiences the ups and downs of selling war bonds on a cross-country tour of the U.S., and has a chance encounter with his brother George, a fellow marine, in California. (cc)(n).(n)

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: Still fighting on Peleliu in September 1944, in extreme heat and with little drinking water, Leckie, Sledge and the rest of the 1st Marines attempt a dangerous assault across the airfield under constant fire from entrenched enemy positions. Meanwhile, Sid Phillips pays a visit to Sledge's parents back in Mobile, Ala., and does his best to assure them their son will be all right. (cc)(n).(n)

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: The battle for control of Peleliu continues in October 1944 as Sledge's unit is rocked by devastating casualties, disheartened by an enemy unwilling to surrender and brought to the breaking point by the brutality of war. Meanwhile, Basilone's war-bond campaign begins to weigh on his conscience. (cc)(n).(n)

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: Basilone's request to leave the war-bonds campaign is finally granted, and he's assigned to California's Camp Pendleton in December 1943 to train new recruits. At the base, he falls for a fellow sergeant, Lena Riggi, though both of them know he's likely to return to combat, which he does in February 1945 for the invasion of Iwo Jima. (cc)(n).(n)

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: Weeks of fighting on Okinawa throughout May 1945 take its toll on Sledge, Shelton and the rest of the 1st Marines, who face heavy resistance from last-ditch efforts by the Japanese and cope with the additional stress of civilians caught in the crossfire. (cc)(n).(n)

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: After the Japanese surrender on August 15, 1945, Leckie leaves a Long Island hospital for home in New Jersey, where he begins an awkward courtship with his neighbor Vera and haggles for his old job at the newspaper. Meanwhile, Sledge goes back to Alabama on a train with Snafu and Burgin, and reunites with Phillips, but has trouble readjusting to civilian life; and Lena Basilone has an emotional introduction to her slain husband's family in New Jersey. (cc)(n).(n)
